thread.title: First Sound Bank Appoints Christopher Green as Vice President, Private Banker and Cash Management Officer

author: cnbc.com
title: First Sound Bank Appoints Christopher Green as Vice President, Private Banker and Cash Management Officer
text:
SEATTLE--(BUSINESS WIRE)-- First Sound Bank (OTCBB:FSWA) announced the appointment of Christopher Green as Vice President, Private Banker and Cash Management Officer. Green brings more than 15 years of experience in the financial services industry, most recently serving as a commercial banking officer for Columbia Bank. He is skilled in treasury and cash management and has a deep understanding of the unique banking needs of property managers and homeowner associations.
“As we continue to strengthen our private banking capabilities, we are especially excited to welcome Christopher to our growing team,” said Jon Shelton, President and Chief Executive Officer of First Sound Bank. “Christopher brings great enthusiasm and creativity to this role which will enable us to further enhance the client experience with personalized service and solutions.”
Green is also passionate about advancing the role of technology in the banking field, ensuring greater convenience and security for customers. He will work one-on-one with customers to develop customized banking solutions that meet their individual needs.
As a longtime Seattle resident, Green has always felt that it is very important to give back to the community. He is an active volunteer at the Rotary Boys and & Girls Club and a member of the Washington State chapter of Community Associations Institute (WSCAI) where he volunteers regularly at the Ronald McDonald House in Seattle.
About First Sound Bank
Based in Seattle, First Sound Bank is committed to delivering personalized service, convenient access and competitive rates to support the needs of the local business community. Founded in 2004, the Bank caters to small and medium-sized businesses, not-for-profit organizations, entrepreneurs, professionals, and service companies, offering a full suite of cash management services and online and mobile banking services. To learn more, please visit www.firstsoundbank.com .
